events.title: Upcoming Events
events.description: Join us at these upcoming campaign events

event1.title: Town Hall Meeting
event1.description: Join us for an open discussion about the issues that matter most to our community. Bring your questions and concerns.

event2.title: Neighborhood Canvassing
event2.description: Help us spread our message door-to-door. Training and materials will be provided. Lunch included.

event3.title: Fundraising Dinner
event3.description: Join us for an evening of dinner and discussion to support our campaign. Special guest speakers.

event4.title: Community Clean-Up
event4.description: Help us beautify our community with this volunteer clean-up event. Supplies and refreshments provided.

contact.title: Get Involved
contact.description: There are many ways to support our campaign. Whether you want to volunteer, donate, or just stay informed, we'd love to hear from you.
